name: BitCrypt
description:
BitCrypt is a prototype retro platforming game meant for speedrunning.  

Controls:

Move Left:  Key A, Key Left, D-pad Left, Joy Left

Move Right:  Key D, Key Right, D-pad Right, Joy Right

Jump: Key W, Key Up, Space, A Button

Fullscreen:  Key F

Exit: ESC

Id love to see your best runs!
